TABLE.NAME: ucla_visibility_schedule
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores time ranges for which courses should be hidden.

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the course this range belongs to.

FIELD.NAME: hidefrom
FIELD.COMMENT: Hide the course starting from this date.

FIELD.NAME: hideuntil
FIELD.COMMENT: Hide the course until this date.

FIELD.NAME: title
FIELD.COMMENT: Optional title for this time range.

FIELD.NAME: past
FIELD.COMMENT: Has this range been processed yet?
